lead_paragraph: Striker Didier Drogba has indicated he will not return to Montreal Impact next season, with the Major League Soccer club releasing a video on Twitter thanking him for his service.

headline.print_headline: Drogba Bids Farewell to Montreal After Final Home Game
headline.main: Drogba Bids Farewell to Montreal After Final Home Game
